generic.note: Guests dock inguest berth, bow facing north. In the harbour office there is a sign post. Red on top of white: no entering. White on top of red: no exit.
Request entrance. In the 'voorhaven' there is a sign post. Red on top of white: no entering. White on top of red: no exit.
Listen when approaching. On Mon and Fri announce due to fishing boats.

pleasure.note: Report upon entering ship name, direction and current position relative to buoy MV or MN1

passenger.note: Report upon entering ship name, direction and current position relative to buoy MV or MN1

generic.note: Report 2h before entering, when entering, anchoring, passing Moermanbrug and 1h before leaving.

passenger.note: Report number of head onboard and destination

cargo.note: Ships with dangerous cargo and special transports have a reporting obligation

pleasure.note: During peak traffic (7-9h and 16-18h), only operation for commericial vessel. Pleasure crafts can join.
